verses.verse: And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> if<WH518> thou shalt hearken diligently<WH8085> <WH8085> unto the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> to observe<WH8104> and to do<WH6213> <WH853> all<WH3605> his commandments<WH4687> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee this day,<WH3117> that the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will set<WH5414> thee on high<WH5945> above<WH5921> all<WH3605> nations<WH1471> of the earth: <WH776>

And all<WH3605> these<WH428> blessings<WH1293> shall come<WH935> on<WH5921> thee, and overtake<WH5381> thee, if<WH3588> thou shalt hearken<WH8085> unto the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God.<WH430>
Blessed <WH1288> shalt thou<WH859> be in the city,<WH5892> and blessed<WH1288> shalt thou<WH859> be in the field.<WH7704>

Blessed <WH1288> shall be the fruit<WH6529> of thy body,<WH990> and the fruit<WH6529> of thy ground,<WH127> and the fruit<WH6529> of thy cattle,<WH929> the increase<WH7698> of thy kine,<WH504> and the flocks<WH6251> of thy sheep.<WH6629>
Blessed <WH1288> shall be thy basket<WH2935> and thy store.<WH4863>
Blessed <WH1288> shalt thou<WH859> be when thou comest in,<WH935> and blessed<WH1288> shalt thou<WH859> be when thou goest out.<WH3318>

The LORD<WH3068> shall cause<WH5414> <WH853> thine enemies<WH341> that rise up<WH6965> against<WH5921> thee to be smitten<WH5062> before thy face:<WH6440> they shall come out<WH3318> against<WH413> thee one<WH259> way,<WH1870> and flee<WH5127> before<WH6440> thee seven<WH7651> ways.<WH1870>

The LORD<WH3068> shall command<WH6680> <WH853> the blessing<WH1293> upon<WH854> thee in thy storehouses,<WH618> and in all<WH3605> that thou settest<WH4916> thine hand<WH3027> unto; and he shall bless<WH1288> thee in the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee.

The LORD<WH3068> shall establish<WH6965> thee a holy<WH6918> people<WH5971> unto himself, as<WH834> he hath sworn<WH7650> unto thee, if<WH3588> thou shalt keep<WH8104> <WH853> the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> and walk<WH1980> in his ways.<WH1870>

And all<WH3605> people<WH5971> of the earth<WH776> shall see<WH7200> that<WH3588> thou art called<WH7121> by<WH5921> the name<WH8034> of the LORD;<WH3068> and they shall be afraid<WH3372> of<WH4480> thee.

And the LORD<WH3068> shall make thee plenteous<WH3498> in goods,<WH2896> in the fruit<WH6529> of thy body,<WH990> and in the fruit<WH6529> of thy cattle,<WH929> and in the fruit<WH6529> of thy ground,<WH127> in<WH5921> the land<WH127> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> swore<WH7650> unto thy fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> thee.

The LORD<WH3068> shall open<WH6605> unto thee<WH853> his good<WH2896> treasure,<WH214> <WH853> the heaven<WH8064> to give<WH5414> the rain<WH4306> unto thy land<WH776> in his season,<WH6256> and to bless<WH1288> <WH853> all<WH3605> the work<WH4639> of thine hand:<WH3027> and thou shalt lend<WH3867> unto many<WH7227> nations,<WH1471> and thou<WH859> shalt not<WH3808> borrow.<WH3867>

And the LORD<WH3068> shall make<WH5414> thee the head,<WH7218> and not<WH3808> the tail;<WH2180> and thou shalt be<WH1961> above<WH4605> only,<WH7535> and thou shalt not<WH3808> be<WH1961> beneath;<WH4295> if<WH3588> that thou hearken<WH8085> unto<WH413> the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee this day,<WH3117> to observe<WH8104> and to do<WH6213> them:

And thou shalt not<WH3808> go aside<WH5493> from any<WH4480> <WH3605> of the words<WH1697> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee this day,<WH3117> to the right hand,<WH3225> or to the left,<WH8040> to go<WH1980> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> to serve<WH5647> them.

But it shall come to pass,<WH1961> if<WH518> thou wilt not<WH3808> hearken<WH8085> unto the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> to observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> <WH853> all<WH3605> his commandments<WH4687> and his statutes<WH2708> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee this day;<WH3117> that all<WH3605> these<WH428> curses<WH7045> shall come<WH935> upon<WH5921> thee, and overtake<WH5381> thee:
Cursed <WH779> shalt thou<WH859> be in the city,<WH5892> and cursed<WH779> shalt thou<WH859> be in the field.<WH7704>
Cursed <WH779> shall be thy basket<WH2935> and thy store.<WH4863>
Cursed <WH779> shall be the fruit<WH6529> of thy body,<WH990> and the fruit<WH6529> of thy land,<WH127> the increase<WH7698> of thy kine,<WH504> and the flocks<WH6251> of thy sheep.<WH6629>
Cursed <WH779> shalt thou<WH859> be when thou comest in,<WH935> and cursed<WH779> shalt thou<WH859> be when thou goest out.<WH3318>

The LORD<WH3068> shall send<WH7971> upon thee<WH853> cursing,<WH3994> <WH853> vexation,<WH4103> and rebuke,<WH4045> in all<WH3605> that thou settest<WH4916> thine hand<WH3027> unto for<WH834> to do,<WH6213> until<WH5704> thou be destroyed,<WH8045> and until<WH5704> thou perish<WH6> quickly;<WH4118> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the wickedness<WH7455> of thy doings,<WH4611> whereby<WH834> thou hast forsaken<WH5800> me.

The LORD<WH3068> shall make<WH853> the pestilence<WH1698> cleave<WH1692> unto thee, until<WH5704> he have consumed<WH3615> thee from off<WH4480> <WH5921> the land,<WH127> whither<WH834> <WH8033> thou<WH859> goest<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it.

The LORD<WH3068> shall smite<WH5221> thee with a consumption,<WH7829> and with a fever,<WH6920> and with an inflammation,<WH1816> and with an extreme burning,<WH2746> and with the sword,<WH2719> and with blasting,<WH7711> and with mildew;<WH3420> and they shall pursue<WH7291> thee until<WH5704> thou perish.<WH6>
And thy heaven<WH8064> that<WH834> is over<WH5921> thy head<WH7218> shall be<WH1961> brass,<WH5178> and the earth<WH776> that<WH834> is under<WH8478> thee shall be iron.<WH1270>

The LORD<WH3068> shall make<WH5414> <WH853> the rain<WH4306> of thy land<WH776> powder<WH80> and dust:<WH6083> from<WH4480> heaven<WH8064> shall it come down<WH3381> upon<WH5921> thee, until<WH5704> thou be destroyed.<WH8045>

The LORD<WH3068> shall cause<WH5414> thee to be smitten<WH5062> before<WH6440> thine enemies:<WH341> thou shalt go out<WH3318> one<WH259> way<WH1870> against<WH413> them, and flee<WH5127> seven<WH7651> ways<WH1870> before<WH6440> them: and shalt be<WH1961> removed<WH2189> into all<WH3605> the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth.<WH776>

And thy carcass<WH5038> shall be<WH1961> meat<WH3978> unto all<WH3605> fowls<WH5775> of the air,<WH8064> and unto the beasts<WH929> of the earth,<WH776> and no man<WH369> shall frighten them away.<WH2729>

The LORD<WH3068> will smite<WH5221> thee with the botch<WH7822> of Egypt,<WH4714> and with the emerods,<WH6076> and with the scab,<WH1618> and with the itch,<WH2775> whereof<WH834> thou canst<WH3201> not<WH3808> be healed.<WH7495>
The LORD<WH3068> shall smite<WH5221> thee with madness,<WH7697> and blindness,<WH5788> and astonishment<WH8541> of heart: <WH3824>

And thou shalt<WH1961> grope<WH4959> at noonday,<WH6672> as<WH834> the blind<WH5787> gropeth<WH4959> in darkness,<WH653> and thou shalt not<WH3808> prosper<WH6743> <WH853> in thy ways:<WH1870> and thou shalt be<WH1961> only<WH389> oppressed<WH6231> and spoiled<WH1497> evermore,<WH3605> <WH3117> and no man<WH369> shall save<WH3467> thee.

Thou shalt betroth<WH781> a wife,<WH802> and another<WH312> man<WH376> shall lie with<WH7901> her: thou shalt build<WH1129> a house,<WH1004> and thou shalt not<WH3808> dwell<WH3427> therein: thou shalt plant<WH5193> a vineyard,<WH3754> and shalt not<WH3808> gather the grapes<WH2490> thereof.

Thine ox<WH7794> shall be slain<WH2873> before thine eyes,<WH5869> and thou shalt not<WH3808> eat<WH398> thereof:<WH4480> thine ass<WH2543> shall be violently taken away<WH1497> from before thy face,<WH4480> <WH6440> and shall not<WH3808> be restored<WH7725> to thee: thy sheep<WH6629> shall be given<WH5414> unto thine enemies,<WH341> and thou shalt have none<WH369> to rescue<WH3467> them.

Thy sons<WH1121> and thy daughters<WH1323> shall be given<WH5414> unto another<WH312> people,<WH5971> and thine eyes<WH5869> shall look,<WH7200> and fail<WH3616> with longing for<WH413> them all<WH3605> the day<WH3117> long: and there shall be no<WH369> might<WH410> in thine hand.<WH3027>

The fruit<WH6529> of thy land,<WH127> and all<WH3605> thy labors,<WH3018> shall a nation<WH5971> which<WH834> thou knowest<WH3045> not<WH3808> eat up;<WH398> and thou shalt be<WH1961> only<WH7535> oppressed<WH6231> and crushed<WH7533> always:<WH3605> <WH3117>
So that thou shalt be<WH1961> mad<WH7696> for the sight<WH4480> <WH4758> of thine eyes<WH5869> which<WH834> thou shalt see.<WH7200>

The LORD<WH3068> shall smite<WH5221> thee in<WH5921> the knees,<WH1290> and in<WH5921> the legs,<WH7785> with a sore<WH7451> botch<WH7822> that<WH834> cannot<WH3201> <WH3808> be healed,<WH7495> from the sole<WH4480> <WH3709> of thy foot<WH7272> unto<WH5704> the top of thy head.<WH6936>

The LORD<WH3068> shall bring<WH1980> thee, and thy king<WH4428> which<WH834> thou shalt set<WH6965> over<WH5921> thee, unto<WH413> a nation<WH1471> which<WH834> neither<WH3808> thou<WH859> nor thy fathers<WH1> have known;<WH3045> and there<WH8033> shalt thou serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> wood<WH6086> and stone.<WH68>
And thou shalt become<WH1961> an astonishment,<WH8047> a proverb,<WH4912> and a byword,<WH8148> among all<WH3605> nations<WH5971> whither<WH834> <WH8033> the LORD<WH3068> shall lead<WH5090> thee.
Thou shalt carry much seed out<WH3318> <WH7227> <WH2233> into the field,<WH7704> and shalt gather but little in;<WH622> <WH4592> for<WH3588> the locust<WH697> shall consume<WH2628> it.

Thou shalt plant<WH5193> vineyards,<WH3754> and dress<WH5647> them, but shalt neither<WH3808> drink<WH8354> of the wine,<WH3196> nor<WH3808> gather<WH103> the grapes; for<WH3588> the worms<WH8438> shall eat<WH398> them.

Thou shalt have<WH1961> olive trees<WH2132> throughout all<WH3605> thy coasts,<WH1366> but thou shalt not<WH3808> anoint<WH5480> thyself with the oil;<WH8081> for<WH3588> thine olive<WH2132> shall cast<WH5394> his fruit.
Thou shalt beget<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters,<WH1323> but thou shalt not<WH3808> enjoy<WH1961> them; for<WH3588> they shall go<WH1980> into captivity.<WH7628>
All <WH3605> thy trees<WH6086> and fruit<WH6529> of thy land<WH127> shall the locust<WH6767> consume.<WH3423>
The stranger<WH1616> that<WH834> is within<WH7130> thee shall get up<WH5927> above<WH5921> thee very high;<WH4605> <WH4605> and thou<WH859> shalt come down<WH3381> very low.<WH4295> <WH4295>
He <WH1931> shall lend<WH3867> to thee, and thou<WH859> shalt not<WH3808> lend<WH3867> to him: he<WH1931> shall be<WH1961> the head,<WH7218> and thou<WH859> shalt be<WH1961> the tail.<WH2180>

Moreover all<WH3605> these<WH428> curses<WH7045> shall come<WH935> upon<WH5921> thee, and shall pursue<WH7291> thee, and overtake<WH5381> thee, till<WH5704> thou be destroyed;<WH8045> because<WH3588> thou hearkenedst<WH8085> not<WH3808> unto the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> to keep<WH8104> his commandments<WH4687> and his statutes<WH2708> which<WH834> he commanded<WH6680> thee:
And they shall be<WH1961> upon thee for a sign<WH226> and for a wonder,<WH4159> and upon thy seed<WH2233> forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>

Because <WH8478> <WH834> thou servedst<WH5647> not<WH3808> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> with joyfulness,<WH8057> and with gladness<WH2898> of heart,<WH3824> for the abundance<WH4480> <WH7230> of all<WH3605> things;

Therefore shalt thou serve<WH5647> <WH853> thine enemies<WH341> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> shall send<WH7971> against thee, in hunger,<WH7458> and in thirst,<WH6772> and in nakedness,<WH5903> and in want<WH2640> of all<WH3605> things: and he shall put<WH5414> a yoke<WH5923> of iron<WH1270> upon<WH5921> thy neck,<WH6677> until<WH5704> he have destroyed<WH8045> thee.

The LORD<WH3068> shall bring<WH5375> a nation<WH1471> against<WH5921> thee from far,<WH4480> <WH7350> from the end<WH4480> <WH7097> of the earth,<WH776> as swift as<WH834> the eagle<WH5404> flieth;<WH1675> a nation<WH1471> whose<WH834> tongue<WH3956> thou shalt not<WH3808> understand;<WH8085>
A nation<WH1471> of fierce<WH5794> countenance,<WH6440> which<WH834> shall not<WH3808> regard<WH5375> the person<WH6440> of the old,<WH2205> nor<WH3808> show favor<WH2603> to the young: <WH5288>

And he shall eat<WH398> the fruit<WH6529> of thy cattle,<WH929> and the fruit<WH6529> of thy land,<WH127> until<WH5704> thou be destroyed:<WH8045> which<WH834> also shall not<WH3808> leave<WH7604> thee either corn,<WH1715> wine,<WH8492> or oil,<WH3323> or the increase<WH7698> of thy kine,<WH504> or flocks<WH6251> of thy sheep,<WH6629> until<WH5704> he have destroyed<WH6> thee.

And he shall besiege<WH6887> thee in all<WH3605> thy gates,<WH8179> until<WH5704> thy high<WH1364> and fenced<WH1219> walls<WH2346> come down,<WH3381> wherein<WH834> thou<WH859> trustedst,<WH982> throughout all<WH3605> thy land:<WH776> and he shall besiege<WH6887> thee in all<WH3605> thy gates<WH8179> throughout all<WH3605> thy land,<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath given<WH5414> thee.

And thou shalt eat<WH398> the fruit<WH6529> of thine own body,<WH990> the flesh<WH1320> of thy sons<WH1121> and of thy daughters,<WH1323> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath given<WH5414> thee, in the siege,<WH4692> and in the straitness,<WH4689> wherewith<WH834> thine enemies<WH341> shall distress<WH6693> thee:

So that the man<WH376> that is tender<WH7390> among you, and very<WH3966> delicate,<WH6028> his eye<WH5869> shall be evil<WH7489> toward his brother,<WH251> and toward the wife<WH802> of his bosom,<WH2436> and toward the remnant<WH3499> of his children<WH1121> which<WH834> he shall leave: <WH3498>

So that he will not give<WH4480> <WH5414> to any<WH259> of<WH4480> them of the flesh<WH4480> <WH1320> of his children<WH1121> whom<WH834> he shall eat:<WH398> because<WH4480> <WH1097> he hath nothing<WH3605> left<WH7604> him in the siege,<WH4692> and in the straitness,<WH4689> wherewith<WH834> thine enemies<WH341> shall distress<WH6693> thee in all<WH3605> thy gates.<WH8179>

The tender<WH7390> and delicate woman<WH6028> among you, which<WH834> would not<WH3808> adventure<WH5254> to set<WH3322> the sole<WH3709> of her foot<WH7272> upon<WH5921> the ground<WH776> for delicateness<WH4480> <WH6026> and tenderness,<WH4480> <WH7391> her eye<WH5869> shall be evil<WH7489> toward the husband<WH376> of her bosom,<WH2436> and toward her son,<WH1121> and toward her daughter,<WH1323>

And toward her young one<WH7988> that cometh out<WH3318> from between<WH4480> <WH996> her feet,<WH7272> and toward her children<WH1121> which<WH834> she shall bear:<WH3205> for<WH3588> she shall eat<WH398> them for want<WH2640> of all<WH3605> things secretly<WH5643> in the siege<WH4692> and straitness,<WH4689> wherewith<WH834> thine enemy<WH341> shall distress<WH6693> thee in thy gates.<WH8179>

If <WH518> thou wilt not<WH3808> observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> <WH853> all<WH3605> the words<WH1697> of this<WH2063> law<WH8451> that are written<WH3789> in this<WH2088> book,<WH5612> that thou mayest fear<WH3372> <WH853> this<WH2088> glorious<WH3513> and fearful<WH3372> name,<WH8034> <WH853> THE LORD<WH3068> THY GOD;<WH430>

Then the LORD<WH3068> will make<WH853> thy plagues<WH4347> wonderful,<WH6381> and the plagues<WH4347> of thy seed,<WH2233> even great<WH1419> plagues,<WH4347> and of long continuance,<WH539> and sore<WH7451> sicknesses,<WH2483> and of long continuance.<WH539>
Moreover he will bring<WH7725> upon thee<WH853> all<WH3605> the diseases<WH4064> of Egypt,<WH4714> which<WH834> thou wast afraid<WH3025> of;<WH4480> <WH6440> and they shall cleave<WH1692> unto thee.

Also <WH1571> every<WH3605> sickness,<WH2483> and every<WH3605> plague,<WH4347> which<WH834> is not<WH3808> written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of this<WH2063> law,<WH8451> them will the LORD<WH3068> bring<WH5927> upon<WH5921> thee, until<WH5704> thou be destroyed.<WH8045>

And ye shall be left<WH7604> few<WH4592> in number,<WH4962> whereas<WH8478> <WH834> ye were<WH1961> as the stars<WH3556> of heaven<WH8064> for multitude;<WH7230> because<WH3588> thou wouldest not<WH3808> obey<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God.<WH430>

And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> rejoiced<WH7797> over<WH5921> you to do you good,<WH3190> <WH853> and to multiply<WH7235> you; so<WH3651> the LORD<WH3068> will rejoice<WH7797> over<WH5921> you to destroy<WH6> you, and to bring you to naught;<WH8045> <WH853> and ye shall be plucked<WH5255> from off<WH4480> <WH5921> the land<WH127> whither<WH834> <WH8033> thou<WH859> goest<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it.

And the LORD<WH3068> shall scatter<WH6327> thee among all<WH3605> people,<WH5971> from the one end<WH4480> <WH7097> of the earth<WH776> even unto<WH5704> the other;<WH7097> <WH776> and there<WH8033> thou shalt serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> which<WH834> neither<WH3808> thou<WH859> nor thy fathers<WH1> have known,<WH3045> even wood<WH6086> and stone.<WH68>

And among these<WH1992> nations<WH1471> shalt thou find no ease,<WH7280> <WH3808> neither<WH3808> shall the sole<WH3709> of thy foot<WH7272> have<WH1961> rest:<WH4494> but the LORD<WH3068> shall give<WH5414> thee there<WH8033> a trembling<WH7268> heart,<WH3820> and failing<WH3631> of eyes,<WH5869> and sorrow<WH1671> of mind: <WH5315>

And thy life<WH2416> shall hang<WH1961> in doubt<WH8511> before<WH4480> <WH5048> thee; and thou shalt fear<WH6342> day<WH3119> and night,<WH3915> and shalt have none assurance<WH539> <WH3808> of thy life: <WH2416>

In the morning<WH1242> thou shalt say,<WH559> Would God<WH4130> <WH5414> it were even!<WH6153> and at even<WH6153> thou shalt say,<WH559> Would God<WH4130> <WH5414> it were morning!<WH1242> for the fear<WH4480> <WH6343> of thine heart<WH3824> wherewith<WH834> thou shalt fear,<WH6342> and for the sight<WH4480> <WH4758> of thine eyes<WH5869> which<WH834> thou shalt see.<WH7200>

And the LORD<WH3068> shall bring<WH7725> thee into Egypt<WH4714> again with ships,<WH591> by the way<WH1870> whereof<WH834> I spoke<WH559> unto thee, Thou shalt see<WH7200> it no<WH3808> more<WH3254> again:<WH5750> and there<WH8033> ye shall be sold<WH4376> unto your enemies<WH341> for bondmen<WH5650> and bondwomen,<WH8198> and no man<WH369> shall buy<WH7069> you.
